ygData.msgSnippet: I have the Left Vambrace,...eagerly awaiting the right. I too am wanting this item as well..to replace my very worn out Barbed Arms (hehe..yes level 39 with
ygData.messageBody:
I have the Left Vambrace,...eagerly awaiting the
right. I too am wanting this item as well..to replace
my very worn out Barbed Arms (hehe..yes level 39 with
barbed :)

I'll post stats and SS if im ever lucky enough to get
both parts.


Bathory D'Allatu

> Has anyone gotten some SK arms yet? That's the only

> those.

> Dravith Vandre'i
